name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Language Lens: Beyond Translation - Break Down Grammar, Grasp the Meaning

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: More than translation. Understand the meaning and structure behind any text, not just the words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LanguageLens offers more than just basic translationâ€”it helps you truly understand the grammar and meaning behind the text you encounter on websites and in Netflix subtitles. By providing grammar breakdowns and in-line translations, it makes language learning more practical and engaging.

Features include dual subtitles on Netflix, phonetic pronunciation guides for character-based languages (like Chinese, Japanese, and Korean), and comprehensive grammar insights.

With automatic language detection and support for all languages, LanguageLens makes learning effortless and effective.

Download LanguageLens and make your language learning journey more immersive and enjoyable!
